application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 21/03944/HOU (Part conversion of garage into habitable space, erection of single storey front extension in existing canopy. Alteration to fenestration)
decision_conditions: The development shall be carried out in accordance with the Fire Statement hereby approved.Reason: In the interests of fire safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021. This is required prior to commencement as it goes to the heart of the scheme design
